Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-brown. Rectangular stamp with crosses in corners.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '2̣8̣'. Name Aristokrates. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0077.11.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (65)
